project.description: The project where the component will be located.

story.description: Whether generate story of the component for storybook

export.description: Whether the component should be exported from the library

directory.description: The directory for creating the generator file is determined by the `--directoryFormat` option. If set to `as-provided`, the path is relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it is relative to the library root.

directoryFormat.description: Directory configuration. When set to `as-provided`, the generator file is created in the given directory, relative to the current working directory, independent of the project structure. If set to `root`, the file is created relative to the library root, incorporating the project structure.
